TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 708
TEI.2.document_title: Stephen F. Austin to Francis Bigham, 11-17-1823

barker_notes.barker_summary: Receipt for $1,291.80, to be applied toward payment for land.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 708

div1.p: Receipt for $1,291.80, to be applied toward payment for land.

Received November 17, 1823 of Francis Bigham Twelve hundred and Ninety one Dollars and Eighty cents for which I hereby obligate myself to make him Said Bigham complete titles for land in my new Colony in the Province of Texas at the rate of twelve Dollars and fifty cents pr hundred acres, which land must be actually inhabited and cultivated within two years from this date
Witness my hand the day and date above written—
Recd payment for the above receipt in full October 20, 1825
